mapper.select: SELECT SUBSTR(END_TIME,7,2) AS "DATE" , TRUNC(((TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(OP_BIN,1,4)) + TO_NUMBER( SUBSTR(OP_BIN,6,4)) + TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(OP_BIN,11,4)) + TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(OP_BIN,16,4))) / (TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(OP_BIN,1,4)) + TO_NUMBER( SUBSTR(OP_BIN,6,4)) + TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(OP_BIN,11,4)) + TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(OP_BIN,16,4))+ TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(OP_BIN,21,4))+ TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(OP_BIN,26,4))+ TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(OP_BIN,31,4))+ TO_NUMBER( SUBSTR(OP_BIN,36,4))))*100,2) AS YIELD FROM MAIN_BIN ORDER BY END_TIME
